div.bibl: The Reform Advocate, wk. of June 25, 1892. [MAX BENDIX, DIRECTOR OF CHICAGO COLLEGE, VIOLIN DEPARTMENT]

body.p: Max Bendix has been engaged as the director of the violin department of the Chicago College of Vocal and Instrumental Art. It is Mr. Bendix's intention to establish a complete violin school, with a corps of the principal violinists of the Chicago orchestra as his assistants.
